participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emma enjoys deep conversations and has a passion for the arts.
participant_1.background: I'm a tea enthusiast who loves spending time with my family and friends. I play the piano, but only at home because caffeine makes my hands shake. I don't use social media very much, because it's not my style. I am blonde. I enjoy spending time with my parents and friends, but also like to have time to myself to relax.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and resourceful, Jake is always looking for new ideas and enjoys sharing his passions with others.
participant_2.background: I'm from the Midwest, where meat and potatoes are king. I have a cat named Leela. I own a custom upholstery shop. I am a genius, but my parents have no idea about my hobby. I am 29 years old.

content.text: Hello! I'm a tea enthusiast, what about you?
I'm a tea enthusiast too! I love trying new teas and I have a huge collection at home.
That's awesome! What's your favorite type of tea?
I love green tea! It's so refreshing and healthy.
I love green tea too! I also love oolong tea.
Oolong tea is great! I love the smoky flavor.
What about you? What's your favorite type of tea?
I love all types of tea! I'm not really picky.
That's great! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! I love meeting people who love tea as much as I do.
Me too! It's so much fun to talk about tea and share our favorite teas with each other.
Yes! I love it when I find someone who I can talk to about tea for hours.
Me too! I'm so glad we met!
Me too! I hope we can talk about tea again soon.
Definitely! I'd love to hear more about your tea collection.
Sure! I'd love to show you it sometime.
Great! I'm free this weekend if you want to come over.
That sounds perfect! I'll bring some tea to share.
